alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Inland Martin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Martin County through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jonathan Dickinson State Park, or near Hobe Sound. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jupiter, Tequesta, Jupiter Island, Hobe Sound and Hobe Sound Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. On rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
